sentences.en: Clouds return radiant energy to the surface primarily via the atmospheric window.
sentences.cn: 云主要通过大气窗区向地表辐射能量.

sentences.en: For 40 years she has captivated the world with her radiant looks.
sentences.cn: 40年来，她那令人惊艳的美貌让全世界为之痴迷。

sentences.en: He gave a radiant smile when he heard the news.
sentences.cn: 他听到这个消息后露出欣喜的微笑.

sentences.en: He is doing research on radiant intensity.
Her face was radiant with delight at the good news.
sentences.cn: 听了这个好消息,她的脸上乐开了花.

sentences.en: Irradiance or its equivalent, the plane radiant temperature, can be simply measured.
sentences.cn: 可以简单地量测辐照度或其当量 -- 平面辐射温度.

sentences.en: On her wedding day the bride looked truly radiant.
sentences.cn: 婚礼那天，新娘看上去真是光彩照人。

sentences.en: Out on the bay the morning is radiant.
sentences.cn: 海湾里的早晨阳光灿烂。

sentences.en: She looked radiant in a white silk dress.
sentences.cn: 她身穿白色真丝礼服，看上去光彩照人。

sentences.en: The concepts of radiant emittance and of irradiance are complementary.
sentences.cn: 辐射的发射强度和辐照度是两个互补的概念.

sentences.en: The evening sun warms the old red brick wall to a radiant glow.
sentences.cn: 夕阳为古老的红砖墙罩上了一层暖暖的炫目光辉。

sentences.en: The wind is gentle and the sun radiant.
This diode produces about nine times more radiant power than that one.
sentences.cn: 这只二级管的耗散功率比那只大8倍.

sentences.en: When he told the girl this, she was radiant.
sentences.cn: 当他把这些话讲给少女听时, 少女露出动人的笑容.
